question.body: The arrow is in the coronal plane, pointing toward the mid-saggital plane. Which directional term best depicts the direction the arrow is pointing?

response.feedback: Correct. This arrow points along the coronal plane and toward the mid-sagittal plane.
Incorrect. An arrow pointing in the lateral direction would point away from the mid-sagittal plane. This arrow points along the coronal plane and toward the mid-sagittal plane.

part.hint: As long as you are moving toward the mid-saggital plane from either side, you are moving in this direction.
